title: Nobel peace prize winners announced
description: The award goes to a Belarusian human rights advocate and two organisations in Russia and Ukraine. Also: banks in Lebanon will close their doors indefinitely after repeated armed attacks, and Ukrainians are braced for more possible attacks as Vladimir Putin turns 70 on Friday.
itunes:subtitle: The award goes to a human rights advocate and two organisations in Russia and Ukraine
itunes:summary: The award goes to a Belarusian human rights advocate and two organisations in Russia and Ukraine. Also: banks in Lebanon will close their doors indefinitely after repeated armed attacks, and Ukrainians are braced for more possible attacks as Vladimir Putin turns 70 on Friday.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
